footer_about: We specialize in monumental drafting, software, and plotter (cutter) sales. We are sure you will find our beautiful artwork will help to complete your sale. If quality workmanship and attention to detail are important to you, remember, our goal and motto is always, “We specialize in helping you create beautiful monuments.”   We are a family owned business, with over 50 years combined experience in monumental drafting. As a faith based owned and operated business, you can be assured that honesty and integrity are built into our business from the ground up.
